sentences.sentence: She despised herself when she remembered the utter self - abasement of the past.
sentences.translation: 当她回忆起过去的不折不扣的自卑时，她便瞧不起自己。

sentences.sentence: In our world there will be no emotions except fear, rage, triumph, and self - abasement.
sentences.translation: 在我们的世界里，除了恐惧、狂怒、得意、自贬以外，没有别的感情。

sentences.sentence: The characteristics of kafkaesque s personality mechanism was fear and self - abasement.
sentences.translation: 恐惧和自卑是卡夫卡人格机制的主要特征。
